item.title: 12 New Bisexual Books to Read for Celebrate Bisexuality Day!
item.description: Check out these 12 new bisexual books, from romance to horror, to read for Celebrate Bisexuality Day—or any day!

item.title: I’ll Take That: 5 Terrific SFF Books Featuring Thieves
item.description: These five fun sci-fi and fantasy books featuring thieves will be perfect additions to your fall reading!

item.title: University Libraries are Being Targeted by Swatters, and More Library News
item.description: University libraries are facing an alarming increase in hoax active shooter swatting calls. Plus, more library news.

item.title: Potions and Devotions: 6 Dark Academia Romantasy Books to Read This Fall
item.description: Magic, romance, secrets, and creepy colleges: these dark academia romantasy books have it all.

item.title: 6 of the Best New Books In Translation Out Fall 2025
item.description: Here are six of the most exciting new books in translation coming out in the fall, including releases from Bora Chung and Samanta Schweblin.
